maintainer.name: Andrej Kacian
maintainer.description: net-mail: If I'm not available, feel free to touch this package.

pkgmetadata.longdescription: libEtPan ! is a mail purpose library. It will be used for low-level mail handling : network protocols (IMAP/NNTP/POP3/SMTP over TCP/IP and SSL/TCP/IP, already implemented), local storage (mbox/MH/maildir), message / MIME parser
